attributes.action: introduce new lower VAT bands for energy efficient products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the last few months we have heard of various new proposed stealth taxes to raise extra money from the general public under the guise of saving the enviroment.  We ask the Prime Minister, if he is serious about saving the enviroment to put the goverments money where it's mouth is for once by ether zero rating or reducing VAT on energy saving products.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
